title: fennic
author: fennic
content: Well in life there are two sets of people one believes luck others believe knowledge.Here are two commonplace all crypto people hang out the whole day. Gambling Trading Are you addict to it ? have you ever lost yourself there come out of it?I lost around 3 k to 4 k dollar now I feel it is more now I feel its more to my financial situation.I did not trade much in the crypto world but I just trade a few amounts in my local share marketShare how you felt? did you come out?

comments.author: eXPHorizon
comments.created_time: December 04, 2022, 10:56:07 PMLast edit: December 04, 2022, 11:11:53 PM by eXPHorizon
comments.body: With Bitcoin. Only massive lossI am not a Gambler nor a Trader. What i did was purely out of Calculations.. but those Calculations have changed and agendas + ideals as well

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: Quote from: fennic on December 04, 2022, 04:39:30 PMWell in life there are two sets of people one believes luck others believe knowledge.Here are two commonplace all crypto people hang out the whole day. Gambling Trading Are you addict to it ? have you ever lost yourself there come out of it?I lost around 3 k to 4 k dollar now I feel it is more now I feel its more to my financial situation.I did not trade much in the crypto world but I just trade a few amounts in my local share marketShare how you felt? did you come out?All of our actions in gambling will reflect in our living , remember that in life it is our decision that will bring us to whatever we are .

comments.author: eXPHorizon
comments.created_time: December 05, 2022, 06:04:11 PMLast edit: December 05, 2022, 07:09:55 PM by eXPHorizon
comments.body: Quote from: Noah22 on December 05, 2022, 05:32:28 PMI lost a lot of time playing video games That is not a waste. I honed my Reflexes playing FPS Games .. It trains the parts of your brain that rely on quick thinking and deduction.... It is not a waste of time trust me

comments.author: Sanni_w
comments.body: I lost $1k in Rug pill and luna.

comments.author: autoprt
comments.body: Quote from: btc78 on December 05, 2022, 01:23:15 AMQuote from: fennic on December 04, 2022, 04:39:30 PMWell in life there are two sets of people one believes luck others believe knowledge.Here are two commonplace all crypto people hang out the whole day. Gambling Trading Are you addict to it ? have you ever lost yourself there come out of it?I lost around 3 k to 4 k dollar now I feel it is more now I feel its more to my financial situation.I did not trade much in the crypto world but I just trade a few amounts in my local share marketShare how you felt? did you come out?All of our actions in gambling will reflect in our living , remember that in life it is our decision that will bring us to whatever we are .i can truly say i have lost quite a bit of money in various types of fees such as late fees, ATM fees, etc.  One of my goals for 2023 is to try to avoid paying out late fees unnecessarily.  I sat down last month and added up all my fees I paid this year and was totally shocked.  I definitely have to do better next year.

comments.author: Riocasino
comments.body: if you focus on your losing you will attract more loses. i avoid discuss such things.

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: I have not lost huge so far now and I will try my best to be secured. I have withdrawn my all investing and now feeling very easy.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I haven’t lost big in anything financially related but we all lose in life at some point. We all experience loss, it may be the death of a loved one, a pet or a big sports game, failing in a job interview etc. Whatever negative things you experience in life, it’s important to keep your head up & never give up. Human beings are resilient, we can suffer a lot & it may not feel fair but we can fight back & succeed if we put everything we have into doing something.If you lose money trading or gambling you can make it back, just take a little time away & come back swinging later.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Everybody gambles when he has faith in what he is doing. He doesn't know that his gamble will really pay off.The biggest thing I ever lost in my life was this universe, when I became Christian. But I gained a whole lot more... eternal life in the up and coming New Universe.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well there is only 1 thing that I think about if my life would be different now I am older. Not knowing my father my entire life has made me be more closer to the small family that are in my life.My biological mother too I am not so close with and sometimes I wish I was when I know its a Holiday and on my Birthday. I now have accepted this is how life dealt me my cards but when I was a kid it was much harder for me to accept it.
